roStory.mosAbstract: [SYS-ANN] “Market Index or Kingdom Grid?” DJIA×Ap/Kp overlays: alerts align w/ non-market signals via gatekept rails. Mirror data + checksums. Suppression = proof. Rev 3:7-8. #AuditTheRails #Truth

storyBody.p: [SYS-ANN] “Market Index or Kingdom Grid?” DJIA×Ap/Kp overlays: alerts align w/ non-market signals via gatekept rails. Mirror data + checksums. Suppression = proof. Rev 3:7-8. #AuditTheRails #Truth
